KraggyHUD_dialog_force_start_desc:
¿Estas seguro que deseas forzar el inicio de la partida?

Por favor solo usa esto en lobbies bugeados, o si un jugador esta afk.
Asegurate de que todos tienen el tiempo suficiente para elegir su equipo.

Gracias :)
KraggyHUD_dialog_install_fed_inv_desc:
Federal Inventory es un mod override, que te entrega iconos coloridos para tus armas, mascaras y desplegables.
Se ve bien al usarlo junto CustomHUD y usara el actualizador de BLT..
KraggyHUD_dialog_rename_inv_tab_desc: Por favor ingresa el nuevo nombre para la esta pagina del inventario.
woldhud_notification_disabled_override_d: Si cambiaste de opinion, da click para que te pregunten nuevamente.
woldhud_notification_restart_override_ti: KraggyHUD: $NAME esta listo para ser instalado.
woldhud_notification_restart_override_de: Por favor reinicia el juego para iniciar la descarga.
KraggyHUD_buy_all_assets_desc: Compra todos los assets que tienes permitido comprar.
KraggyHUD_preplanning_save_tooltip_desc: Guarda tu Planeacion actual, para cargala rapidamente la proxima vez que juegues esta mision.
KraggyHUD_preplanning_load_tooltip_desc: Abre un menu con todas las planeaciones guardadas.
KraggyHUD_preplanning_reset_tooltip_desc: Remueve todos tus assets de la planacion actual, incluyendo tus votos.
KraggyHUD_preplanning_reset_all_tooltip_: Remueve los assets de todos de la planeacion actual, incluyendo tus votos.
KraggyHUD_preplanning_delete_tooltip_des: Limpia tus planeaciones guardadas y elimina algunas.
KraggyHUD_preplanning_dialog_save_desc:
$PLAN


Por favor ingresa un nombre para esta planeacion.
(Usando el nombre de una planeacion esistente la sobreescribira.)
KraggyHUD_preplanning_dialog_delete_desc: Estas segyro que deseas borrar la Planeacion '$NAME'?
KraggyHUD_preplanning_msg_saved_failed: Ha ocurrido un error guardando la planeacion.
KraggyHUD_preplanning_msg_no_current_pla: No tienes nada planeado, que puede ser guardado.
KraggyHUD_preplanning_msg_loaded_failed: Un error ha ocurrido al cargar la planeacion.
KraggyHUD_preplanning_msg_reseted_failed: Un error ha ocurrido al reiniciar la planeacion actual.
KraggyHUD_preplanning_msg_deleted_failed: Un error ha ocurrido al borrar el plan guardado.
KraggyHUD_preplanning_msg_folder_creatio:
Failed to create folder: $FOLDER 
Please make sure the game has the required permissions or create it manually.
KraggyHUD_preplanning_msg_file_creation_:
Failed to create file: $FILE 
Please make sure the game has the required permissions or create it manually.
KraggyHUD_inv_tab_rename_hint: Doble click en la pestaña del inventario seleccionada para renombrarla.
KraggyHUD_locked_assault: ¡¡¡Asalto Policial sin Limite!!!  ¡¡¡Sal lo mas rapido posible!!!
KraggyHUD_skip_blackscreen_desc:
Automaticamente saltar la pantalla negra al iniciar la mision.
(Solo Host)
KraggyHUD_instant_restart_desc:
Saltar automaticamente la cuenta regresiva de 5 segundos antes de reiniciar lobbies online.
(Solo Host)
KraggyHUD_stat_screen_speedup_desc: Aumentar automaticamente la velocidad al contar la experiencia, sin tener que mantener presionado espacio.
KraggyHUD_stat_screen_delay_title: Delay de la pantalla de Estadisticas
KraggyHUD_stat_screen_delay_desc:
Procede X segundos, despues de que tu experiencia sea contada.
(Solo Host, 0 = desactivado)
KraggyHUD_loot_screen_pick_card_desc: Elige automaticamente una tarjeta, cuando la pantalla de seleccion se muestra.
KraggyHUD_loot_screen_pick_specific_card: Specify which card to pick automatically.
KraggyHUD_loot_screen_delay_title: Delay de la seleccion de tarjeta
KraggyHUD_loot_screen_delay_desc:
Procede X segundos despues de que hayas recibido tarjeta.
(Solo Host, 0 = desactivado)
KraggyHUD_replace_weapon_names_desc:
Reemplaza los nombres de la armas con sus contrapartes del Mundo Real.
(Un cambio de mapa es requerido para aplicar...)
KraggyHUD_inventory_tab_names_title: Usar nombres en pestañas del inventario
KraggyHUD_inventory_tab_names_desc:
Personaliza los nombres de las pestañas de tu inventario.
(Cambia los nombres editando '/mods/saves/KraggyHUD_InventoryNames.txt')
KraggyHUD_inventory_names_title: Mostrar nombre de objeto en inventario
KraggyHUD_inventory_names_desc: Muestra los nombres de tus armas, armadura, desplegables, etc. dentro de su espacio en el inventario.
KraggyHUD_skill_names_desc: Mostrar siempre el nombre de las habilidades en la vista del arbol de habilidades.
KraggyHUD_show_mini_icons_desc: Siempre mostrar los iconos de las modificaciones de todas las armas, no solo la seleccionada.
KraggyHUD_no_slowmotion_desc: Desactiva el Slow Motion al colocarse la mascara o ser derribado.
KraggyHUD_reset_options_desc: Reinicia todos los Ajustes a su valor por defecto.
KraggyHUD_reset_options_confirm: ¿Estas seguro que deseas reiniciar todos los Ajustes a su valor por defecto?
KraggyHUD_panels_options_help: Opciones para todos los paneles generales de la HUD, como CustomHUD, Suspicion, Indicadores de Daño, DrivingHUD y mucho mas.
KraggyHUD_use_customhud_desc:
Reemplaza la HUD por defecto con la avanzada CustomHUD, creada por Se7en.
(Un cambio de mapa es requerido para aplicar...)
KraggyHUD_adv_assault_desc:
Muestra la fase de asalto, tiempo y spawns restantes durante el asalto.
(Solo Host)
KraggyHUD_assault_position_desc: Posicion Horizontal de el banner de Asalto.
KraggyHUD_pacified_civs_desc: Cambia el marcador de los civiles no atados, mientras que esten calmados.
KraggyHUD_use_realammo_desc: Muestra la muncion restante, sin contar las balas dentro de tu cargador actual.
KraggyHUD_enable_burstmode_desc: Activa el modo Rafaga para tus armas.
KraggyHUD_playerpanel_options_help: Ajustes para tu propio panel en la HUD.
KraggyHUD_teampanels_options_help: Ajustes para los paneles de tus compañeros en la HUD.
KraggyHUD_panels_position_desc: Posicion Horizontal en el panel de la HUD
KraggyHUD_panels_scale_desc: Factor de escalado del panel de la HUD.
KraggyHUD_panels_oppacity_desc: Selecciona la opacidad del panel de la HUD.
KraggyHUD_panels_show_name_desc: Muestra el nombre de los jugadores.
KraggyHUD_panels_rank_name_desc: Muestra el rank de los jugadores.
KraggyHUD_panels_truncate_tags_desc: Intentar mostrar los tags en Italica de los nombres de jugadores.
KraggyHUD_panels_show_char_desc: Mostrar el personaje elegido por el jugador.
KraggyHUD_panels_show_ping_desc: Mostrar el Ping de los jugadores hacia ti (recomendado).
KraggyHUD_panels_show_status_desc: Muestra el estado actual del icono del jugador (salud, armadura, etc.)
KraggyHUD_panels_condition_icon_color_de: Mostrar el color de el icono de la condicion (derribado, en custodia, swan song, etc.)
KraggyHUD_panels_show_equip_desc: Muestra el equipamiento de los jugadores.
KraggyHUD_panels_show_special_equip_desc: Mostrar el equipamiento especial tomado por los jugadores.
KraggyHUD_panels_special_equip_rows_desc: Numero de items de equipamiento especial que pueden ser colocados en una columna.
KraggyHUD_panels_show_callsign_desc: Mostrar la señal de llamada de un jugador.
KraggyHUD_panels_show_stamina_desc: Muestra un circulo con tu resistencia dentro de tu barra de salud.
KraggyHUD_panels_show_downcounter_desc:
Muestra un contador de incapacitaciones para cada jugador no IA. 
El contador muestra tus incapacitaciones restantes y las de tus compañeros.
KraggyHUD_panels_build_time_desc:
Show a joining players build for X seconds.
(0 = Always)
KraggyHUD_panels_weapon_icon_desc: Which weapon icons do you want to see?
KraggyHUD_panels_weapon_firemode_desc: Show weapon fire mode, or hide it.
KraggyHUD_panels_interaction_time_desc: Only show teammates interaction, if its longer than X seconds.
KraggyHUD_panels_use_ai_color_desc: Use a custom color for the names of bots. (This also affects dmg popups)
KraggyHUD_panels_ai_color_desc: Set the custom color to use for the names of bots. (This also affects dmg popups)
KraggyHUD_chat_waittime_desc:
The time after which the chat fades out
(0 = Never)
KraggyHUD_chat_fontsize_desc: Font Size for the ingame Chat-Box.
KraggyHUD_chat_outputlines_desc: Max Lines to display before scrolling is enabled.
KraggyHUD_spam_filter_desc: Removes PocoHUD and [NGBTO] spam messages from your chat.
KraggyHUD_chat_inputlines_desc: Number of lines of text you can type
KraggyHUD_chat_colored_bg_desc: Colorize the line bg based on the message source
KraggyHUD_suspicion_options_help: Options for the size of the suspicion panel, as well as its visible components.
KraggyHUD_suspicion_scale_desc: Scaling factor for the suspicion panel elements.
KraggyHUD_susp_numberic_outline_desc: Show a black outline around the numeric Suspicion text.
KraggyHUD_killcounter_options_help: Options for the appearance of the kill counter
KraggyHUD_killcounter_player_show_killco: Display a killcounter on your HUD.
KraggyHUD_killcounter_player_color_desc: Select the color for your killcounter.
KraggyHUD_killcounter_player_show_specia: Display kills of special enemies separately.
KraggyHUD_killcounter_player_show_accura: Display your current accuracy on your HUD.
KraggyHUD_killcounter_team_show_killcoun: Display a killcounter on your teammates HUDs.
KraggyHUD_killcounter_team_color_desc: Select the color of the killcounters for your teammates.
KraggyHUD_killcounter_team_show_special_: Display kills of special enemies separately.
KraggyHUD_killcounter_team_show_ai_desc: Do Bots get a Killcounter too?
KraggyHUD_corpse_limit_desc:
How much corpses should we allow to lay around at the same time?
(A Map change is needed to apply...)
KraggyHUD_show_drivinghud_desc:
Show a little HUD in the bottom right while driving.
(A Map change is needed to apply...)
KraggyHUD_drivinghud_show_vehicle_desc: Display a little image of the vehicle and masks of player driving with you.
KraggyHUD_drivinghud_show_loot_desc: Display the vehicles currently loaded and maximum loot numbers.
KraggyHUD_drivinghud_show_passengers_des: Show the amount of passengers in the vehicle and the total amount of seats.
KraggyHUD_drivinghud_show_gear_desc: Display which gear you are driving in.
KraggyHUD_drivinghud_speed_in_mph_desc:
Display the speed in mph.
(Uses km/h otherwise.)
KraggyHUD_drivinghud_show_rpm_desc: Display the vehicles revolutions per minute.
KraggyHUD_infopanels_options_help: Options for the info boxes of HUD List.
KraggyHUD_use_hudlist_desc: HUDList can display many useful things, incl. Drill timers, enemy or loot count, assets on the map, etc. (A Map change is needed to apply...)
KraggyHUD_hudlist_scale_right_desc: Scaling factor of the right list items.
KraggyHUD_hudlist_scale_left_desc: Scaling factor of the left list items.
KraggyHUD_hudlist_scale_buff_desc: Scaling factor of the buff list items.
KraggyHUD_hudlist_box_color_desc:
Front color for Left- and Right List Boxes.
(Currently a Map change is needed to apply...)
KraggyHUD_hudlist_box_bg_color_desc:
Background color for Left- and Right List Boxes.
(Currently a Map change is needed to apply...)
KraggyHUD_hudlist_civcolor_desc: Color for Civilians and Hostages in EnemyCounter.
KraggyHUD_hudlist_thugcolor_desc: Color for Thugs and Mobsters in EnemyCounter.
KraggyHUD_hudlist_copcolor_desc: Color for Cops, SWATs and Heavy SWATs in EnemyCounter.
KraggyHUD_hudlist_specialcolor_desc: Color for Specials and Turrets in EnemyCounter.
KraggyHUD_hudlist_progress_alpha_left_de: Alpha value for the progress bars on left list items.
KraggyHUD_hudlist_progress_alpha_right_d: Alpha value for the progress bars on right list items.
KraggyHUD_hudlist_progress_alpha_buff_de: Alpha value for the progress bars on buff list items.
KraggyHUD_infopanels_left_options_help: Options for the left info list.
KraggyHUD_hudlist_show_timers_desc: Display Timers for Drills, Hacks, etc.
KraggyHUD_hudlist_show_equipment_desc: Determine if we should display that equipment on the right side of your screen.
KraggyHUD_hudlist_show_ecm_retrigger_des: Show, when an ECM is ready to be retriggered.
KraggyHUD_hudlist_show_minions_desc: Show health of all jokered Cops.
KraggyHUD_hudlist_show_own_minions_only_: Only display your own jokered Cops.
KraggyHUD_hudlist_show_pagers_desc: Show Timer for remaining pager time, before the alarm triggers.
KraggyHUD_hudlist_remove_answered_pagers: Remove the pager contour, if it is already getting answered.
KraggyHUD_infopanels_right_options_help: Options for the right info list.
KraggyHUD_hudlist_show_enemies_desc: Show the amount of Enemies on the map.
KraggyHUD_hudlist_aggregate_enemies_desc: Show one HUD Box for all Enemies.
KraggyHUD_hudlist_show_turrets_desc: Show amount of turret vans on the map.
KraggyHUD_hudlist_show_civilians_desc: Show amount of untied civilians on the map.
KraggyHUD_hudlist_aggregate_hostages_des: Show all types of hostages in a singe info box.
KraggyHUD_hudlist_show_pager_count_desc: Display the amount of triggered pagers while in stealth.
KraggyHUD_hudlist_show_cam_count_desc: Show the amount of active cameras while in stealth.
KraggyHUD_hudlist_show_bodybags_count_de: Show the amount of bodybags in your extended inventory directly on your screen while in stealth.
KraggyHUD_hudlist_show_corpse_count_desc: Show the amount of Corpses and bagged bodies on the map while in stealth.
KraggyHUD_hudlist_show_loot_desc: Count the baggable Loot on the current map.
KraggyHUD_hudlist_aggregate_loot_desc: Show all loot types in one count value.
KraggyHUD_hudlist_separate_bagged_loot_d: Separate unbagged and bagged loot counter.
KraggyHUD_hudlist_show_potential_loot_de:
Show the amount of crates on the map in the loot counter. 
(Remember, crates might be empty...)
KraggyHUD_hudlist_show_special_pickups_d: Show amount of chemicals, keycards and other stuff on the map.
KraggyHUD_hudlist_show_mission_pickups_d: Show amount of chemicals, keycards, planks and other mission pickups on the map.
KraggyHUD_hudlist_show_collectables_pick: Show amount of Gage packages, Spec-Ops Cases & Keys et cetera on the map.
KraggyHUD_hudlist_show_valuables_pickups: Show amount of valuable items, like money bundles or necklaces on the map.
KraggyHUD_infopanels_buff_options_help: Options for the buff info list.
KraggyHUD_infopanels_buff_mastermind_opt: Enable or Disable visual indicators for Mastermind Skills.
KraggyHUD_infopanels_buff_enforcer_optio: Enable or Disable visual indicators for Enforcer Skills.
KraggyHUD_infopanels_buff_technician_opt: Enable or Disable visual indicators for Technician Skills.
KraggyHUD_infopanels_buff_ghost_options_: Enable or Disable visual indicators for Ghost Skills.
KraggyHUD_infopanels_buff_fugitive_optio: Enable or Disable visual indicators for Fugitive Skills.
KraggyHUD_infopanels_buff_perkdecks_opti: Enable or Disable visual indicators for Perk Decks.
KraggyHUD_infopanels_buff_gageboosts_opt: Enable or Disable visual indicators for Gage Boosts.
KraggyHUD_infopanels_buff_henchmen_optio: Enable or Disable visual indicators for Henchmen Skills.
KraggyHUD_hudlist_show_buffs_desc: Display active Buffs in the bottom center of your screen.
KraggyHUD_hudlist_damage_increase_compbu: Composite Buff item, displays added value of all damage increasing skills.
KraggyHUD_hudlist_damage_reduction_compb: Composite Buff item, displays added value of all damage reducing skills.
KraggyHUD_hudlist_melee_damage_increase_: Composite Buff item, displays added value of all melee damage increasing skills.
KraggyHUD_hudlist_passive_health_regen_c: Composite Buff item, displays added value of all passive Health regeneration effects.
KraggyHUD_hudlist_total_dodge_chance_com: Composite Buff item, displays added value of all dodge increaing skills.
KraggyHUD_waypoints_color_desc: The color of the default mission waypoints.
KraggyHUD_waypoints_show_ammo_bag_desc: Show Waypoints for Ammo bags, telling you the Percentage left.
KraggyHUD_waypoints_show_doc_bag_desc: Show Waypoints for Doctor Bags, stating the number of charges left.
KraggyHUD_waypoints_show_first_aid_kit_d: Show Waypoints for First Aid Kits, showing its skill effects.
KraggyHUD_waypoints_show_body_bag_desc: Show Waypoints for bodybag cases, telling you the amount of Bodybags left.
KraggyHUD_waypoints_show_grenade_crate_d: Show Waypoints for Grenade Cases, telling you the amount of Grenades left.
KraggyHUD_waypoints_show_sentries_desc: Show Waypoints for Sentries, telling you the amount of ammo left.
KraggyHUD_waypoints_show_ecms_desc: Show Waypoints for ECMs, telling you its remaining battery and feedback duration.
KraggyHUD_waypoints_show_timers_desc: Show Waypoints for timers, telling you the time left and their active Upgrades.
KraggyHUD_waypoints_show_loot_desc: Show the name of the loot above it, when looking near it.
KraggyHUD_waypoints_loot_icon_desc: Show a bag icon on bagged loot.
KraggyHUD_waypoints_loot_offset_desc: Set the height offset of the text label on loot.
KraggyHUD_waypoints_loot_bagged_offset_d: Set the height offset of the text label on bagged loot.
KraggyHUD_waypoints_loot_angle_desc: Set the angle the text label is visible in.
KraggyHUD_waypoints_show_special_equipme: Show waypoints for various different equipments. Good to learn all the different locations.
KraggyHUD_waypoints_show_minions_desc:
Show a Minions Name above its head, in the color of the player who converted him.
Also shows his Killcount.
KraggyHUD_waypoints_show_pager_desc: Show a waypoint for activated pagers. Changes its color, when someone is answering it.
KraggyHUD_tabstats_options_help: Configure the look of your Tabscreen.
KraggyHUD_tabstats_clock_mode_desc: Which mode should the clock use?
KraggyHUD_use_tabstats_desc:
Show your Statistics on Tab Screen instead, of the Mission briefing.
(A Map change is needed to apply...)
KraggyHUD_tabstats_font_size_desc: Font Size for the advanced statistics list.
KraggyHUD_tabstats_color_desc: Color for the advanced statistics list.
KraggyHUD_tabstats_actual_mask_desc: Use your Actual mask instead of your played character picture.
KraggyHUD_tabstats_numberic_loot_desc: Disable the bag counting minigame and display the number right away.
KraggyHUD_crewloadout_options_help: Choose where you want to get Information on which gear and skills your teammates are bringing.
KraggyHUD_crewloadout_lobby_desc: Adds a button to your Lobby screen, that can display the loadout of you and your crew.
KraggyHUD_crewloadout_cs_lobby_desc: Adds a new tab right next to the modifiers and rewards in the crimespree lobby.
KraggyHUD_crewloadout_briefing_desc: Replaces the default Crew Loadout Panel in Mission briefing.
KraggyHUD_crewloadout_tabscreen_desc:
Displays the Skills, Perk and current Ping of players in your lobby. 
(Disabled if you use this feature of LobbyPlayerInfo)
KraggyHUD_profilemenu_replace_desc: Replaces the default Profile-Selector with KraggyHUDs advanced one.
KraggyHUD_dmgindicator_options_help: Set the fade time, size and colors or your damage indicators.
KraggyHUD_show_dmg_indicator_desc: Turns the 4 static damage indicators into several dynamic ones, moving according to your position and the position you were damaged from.
KraggyHUD_dmg_ind_time_desc: Determines the time, the indicator will be shown.
KraggyHUD_dmg_ind_size_desc: Determines the size of the circle, the Indicators are placed around.
KraggyHUD_dmg_indicator_max_count_desc: Specify the max amount of damage indicators on your screen.
KraggyHUD_dmg_shield_color_desc: Color of the indicator, when you only loose armor.
KraggyHUD_dmg_health_color_desc: Color of the indicator, when you loose health.
KraggyHUD_dmg_crit_color_desc: Color of the indicator, when your health is getting low.
KraggyHUD_dmg_vehicle_color_desc: Color of the indicator, when the vehicle you are in gets hit.
KraggyHUD_dmg_friendlyfire_color_desc: Color of the indicator, when you get hit by fire or explosives.
KraggyHUD_dmgpopup_options_help: Popup near an enemies head, displaying the damage dealt.
KraggyHUD_dmg_popup_scale_desc: Changes the size of the damage popups.
KraggyHUD_dmg_popup_skull_scale_desc: Changes the size of the skull icon when it was a kill.
KraggyHUD_dmg_popup_skull_align_desc: Changes the alignment of the skull icon when it was a kill.
KraggyHUD_dmg_popup_time_desc: Determines how long the popup will stay.
KraggyHUD_dmg_popup_height_desc: Determines how high above the enemy the popup will render.
KraggyHUD_dmg_popup_alpha_desc: Set the opacity of the popup.
KraggyHUD_dmg_popup_color_desc: Set the color of the popup for bodyshots
KraggyHUD_dmg_popup_headshot_color_desc: Set the color of the popup for headshots.
KraggyHUD_enemyhealthbar_options_help: Determine which units should get an healthbar.
KraggyHUD_show_enemyhealthbar_desc:
Display Enemy Healthbar at the top enter, when aiming at an enemy.
(A Map change is needed to apply...)
KraggyHUD_show_civhealthbar_desc: Also show Healthbar for Civilians and TeamAI.
KraggyHUD_show_healthbar_pointer_desc: Show Arrow under the Healthbar, aiming at the Owner of the Healthbar.
KraggyHUD_press2hold_lock_mode_desc:
Lock, when already interaction for more than X seconds. (Progress)
Lock, when total Interaction Time is more than X seconds. (Total)
KraggyHUD_press2hold_min_timer_duration_: The Min Timer Duration for the Interaction to lock.
KraggyHUD_press2hold_show_lockindicator_: Show transparent red/green circle overlay, to indicate weather the interaction is locked or not.
KraggyHUD_press2hold_equipment_cancel_de:
Interrupt a locked Interaction with your equipment key.
(Otherwise by pressing your Interaction key again.)
KraggyHUD_press2hold_interrupt_hint_desc: Show a text to remind you, which button will interrupt your Interaction.
KraggyHUD_press2hold_show_timer_desc: Display the remaining time inside the Interaction circle.
KraggyHUD_press2hold_show_circle_desc: Determine if the standard interaction circle should be displayed.
KraggyHUD_press2hold_circle_scale_desc: Scaling factor of the interaction circle.
KraggyHUD_press2hold_timer_scale_desc: Scaling factor of the center timer (Takes circle scale into account).
KraggyHUD_press2hold_text_scale_desc: Scaling factor of the interaction text below the circle.
KraggyHUD_press2hold_show_reload_circle_: Determine, if we should show a reload as an interaction.
KraggyHUD_press2hold_show_melee_circle_d: Determine, if we should show a melee charge as an interaction.
KraggyHUD_press2hold_timer_color_start_d: Color for the Timer to start with.
KraggyHUD_press2hold_timer_color_desc: Color for the Timer to reach on completion.
KraggyHUD_press2hold_show_timer_outline_: Show a black outline around the remaining time text.
KraggyHUD_doubletap_nades_stealth_desc:
When checked, you need to doubletap to throw a nade in stealth. 
Only to prevent accidents.
KraggyHUD_hold_to_pick_desc: Small loot will be automatically picked up, while pressing your interaction key.
KraggyHUD_inventory_options_help: Options to change the visuals of your Inventory and alter Equipment behavior.
KraggyHUD_equipment_senty_auto_ap_desc: Sentries will spawn in AP Mode, if you have the required Skill.
KraggyHUD_equipment_tripmine_auto_sensor: Trip-Mines will spawn in Sensor Mode, while you are in stealth.
KraggyHUD_equipment_ecm_feedback_disable: ECM Feedback will be disabled during stealth.
KraggyHUD_equipment_shaped_charge_disabl:
When checked, you need to doubletap to deploy shaped charges in stealth. 
Only to prevent accidents.
KraggyHUD_laser_autoon_desc: Automatically turns the laser gadget on at startup, on weapons that have one.
KraggyHUD_show_angeled_sight_desc: Tilt the weapon in your Hand, while the angled sight is enabled.
KraggyHUD_gadget_team_sentry_laser_optio: Settings for your Teammates sentries lasers.
KraggyHUD_gadget_sniper_laser_options_he: Setting for the lasers of enemy snipers.
KraggyHUD_gadget_turret_laser_active_opt: Laser settings for the active SWAT turret.
KraggyHUD_gadget_turret_laser_rearming_o: Laser settings for the reloading SWAT turret.
KraggyHUD_gadget_turret_laser_mad_option: Laser settings for the jammed SWAT turret.
KraggyHUD_gadgets_enabled_desc: Use this definition instead of the gadget configuration.
KraggyHUD_gadgets_beam_r_desc: Red component of the laser color.
KraggyHUD_gadgets_beam_g_desc: Green component of the laser color.
KraggyHUD_gadgets_beam_b_desc: Blue component of the laser color.
KraggyHUD_gadgets_dot_match_desc: Determines, if the laser dot should match the beam in color.
KraggyHUD_gadgets_dot_r_desc: Red component of the laser dots color.
KraggyHUD_gadgets_dot_g_desc: Green component of the laser dots color.
KraggyHUD_gadgets_dot_b_desc: Blue component of the laser dots color.
KraggyHUD_gadgets_glow_match_desc: Determines, if the lasers glow should match the beam in color.
KraggyHUD_gadgets_glow_r_desc: Red component of the laser glow color.
KraggyHUD_gadgets_glow_g_desc: Green component of the laser glow color.
KraggyHUD_gadgets_glow_b_desc: Blue component of the laser glow color.
KraggyHUD_gadgets_light_r_desc: Porcentaje de Rojo en el color de la linterna.
KraggyHUD_gadgets_light_g_desc: Porcentaje de Verde en el color de la linterna.
KraggyHUD_gadgets_light_b_desc: Porcentaje de Azul en el color de la linterna.
KraggyHUD_gadgets_light_angle_desc: El angulo en el que brilla la linterna.
KraggyHUD_gadgets_rainbow_frequency_desc: Determina cuan rapido el arcoiris cambia de color.
KraggyHUD_gadgets_pulse_frequency_desc: Detemina el tiempo que toma desde el minimo al maximo del multiplicador de opacidad.
KraggyHUD_skipit_options_help: Opciones para saltar los menus innecesarios automaticamente para guardar tiempo.
KraggyHUD_assaultbanner_options_help: Opciones para cambiar el banner que muestra el estado del asalto.
